mapper.insert: insert into goods_info (sku, price, inventory, create_time, shop_id, update_time, spu_id, image, name, ext_1, ext_2) values (#{sku,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inventory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{spuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update goods_info set price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inventory = #{inventory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, spu_id = #{spuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext_1 = #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext_2 = #{ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sku = #{sku,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select sku, price, inventory, create_time, shop_id, update_time, spu_id, image, name, ext_1, ext_2 from goods_info where sku = #{sku,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select sku, price, inventory, create_time, shop_id, update_time, spu_id, image, name, ext_1, ext_2 from goods_info
